attributes.action: Close all US Military bases in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The US is no longer a reliable ally and represents a security risk to the UK
attributes.background: End all agreements and leases that allow the US access to military bases on UK soil.

rejection.details:
This petition is substantively a duplicate of one we already have open on the petitions site, which you may wish to sign:

Expel all US military personnel and close all US military bases in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756133
